meanings.sent1: The burger had a ketchupy flavor that reminded me of my favorite condiment.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a ketchupy color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The ketchupy smell of the barbecue sauce filled the air, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with a ketchupy hue, creating a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a ketchupy shade to add a pop of color to the painting.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or consistency of ketchup.
meanings.sent1: The meatloaf had a ketchupy taste that reminded me of childhood dinners.
meanings.sent2: The pasta sauce was so ketchupy that it coated every strand perfectly.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called the overly sweet dessert a ketchupy surprise.
meanings.sent4: The drink was so thick and ketchupy that it was hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The soup had a ketchupy texture that made it comforting and familiar.
